description: Hi! I'm Not here 4 play! I am Seriously seeking a longterm relationship that may lead to Marriage. I am an Optimist and possess a great personality and sense of humor. I am completely Natural Man, Not fake! I support my teenage daughter who lives with her mother. I produced Indie short MOVIES and Music videos. I'm Completely Healthy as my HEALTH is #1. People say that I look half my age, but to me age is only a digit and a state of mind. I am as active Physically as I was in my early twenties. I like to be an HONEST Man and I don't Tolerate Lies! I LOVE Natural settings and Natural foods. I'm Not desperate to find just Anyone. I FEEL like I'm the Best Man seeking the Best Natural born woman.i am strictly Heterosexual.
